underlying_goal: Commit a set of related but intermingled changes into a logical git commit.
primary_success: Correctly analyzed intermingled file changes, grouped them conceptually, and created a single, well-written commit message summarizing all the work.
brief_summary: The user triggered a commit. Claude analyzed the staged changes, which included a new feature, security hardening, and refactoring. After initially planning to split them, it recognized the changes were intermingled and created one comprehensive commit with a detailed message.
